name: Fading (itch) (nohoneyflavored)
description:
I kept dreaming.

*

I seemed to keep dreaming for a long time.

Where should it lead me to?

Only one way to find out.

So I can get my answer.

(The paths to get to the answer will differ.)

*

Warning: Differents kinds of violence and death.

(Although this page is manly black and white, inside the game is more colorful.)

Made for LSDJAM 2022! Last update 02/01/23!

(There is an interactive fiction related to it called Strawberries and clean water, but you don't need to play the other to understand this one, maybe to expand the lore)
